content.raw:
[Visual_TEST.Color](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/228/testReport/%28root%29/Visual_TEST/Color/) has been failing on default since pull request #1425.

~~~
89: [ RUN      ] Visual_TEST.Color
89: [Msg] Waiting for master.
89: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
89: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.3.215
89: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 0.8 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
89: [Err] [Visual.cc:2266] Unable to insert mesh[Cannot create GL vertex buffer]
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:344: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Black
89:   Actual: 0 0 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis->GetAmbient()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:345: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Black
89:   Actual: 0 0 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis->GetDiffuse()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:346: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Black
89:   Actual: 0 0 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis->GetSpecular()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:347: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Black
89:   Actual: 0 0 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis->GetEmissive()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:358: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Green
89:   Actual: 0 1 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis2->GetAmbient()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:359: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Blue
89:   Actual: 0 0 1 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis2->GetDiffuse()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:360: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Red
89:   Actual: 1 0 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis2->GetSpecular()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:361: Failure
89: Value of: common::Color::Yellow
89:   Actual: 1 1 0 1
89: Expected: cylinderVis2->GetEmissive()
89: Which is: 0 0 0 0
89: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
89: [  FAILED  ] Visual_TEST.Color (941 ms)
~~~
